fields.name: Over Here (Passive):
fields.value: You become the GIMT alternate account for votes. You will receive the **votes** of this game.

fields.name: To the Hosts:
fields.value: Send every vote to the host. It does not need to have accurate information.

fields.name: Discrepancy:
fields.value: Any player can send their vote to the hosts main account. If the vote or response is different to the one you sent to the hosts, you will be modkilled.

fields.name: Justify (Passive):
fields.value: You may anonymously review responses in a private channel with the hosts, spoiled players, dead players and spectators. You will learn the alignment of the worst reviewed respondee, collectively decided by the outside group. You must NOT be revealed know who the respondee is.
